programme.title: Gold Divers

programme.title: Deadliest Catch

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Shotguns And Fist Fights. With the Russian menace looming, co-captains Johnathan and Jake blast a shotgun at their problems while a vicious fist fight breaks out on the Seabrooke. S16, Ep4

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters

programme.title: Homestead Rescue: Raney Ranch
programme.desc: Risky Business. The Raneys push beyond their limits to finish two cabins, harvest the garden and mount a hunting expedition. This risky project results in a devastating injury. S1, Ep5

programme.desc: Stairway To Heaven. As Marty recovers from a bad fall, the Raneys race to finish cabin walls and build a staircase. Plus, Matt leads a last-ditch moose hunt. S1, Ep6

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: The Tunnel Rats blast their way to a fortune and solo prospector Col Duff is stranded deep in the Queensland outback. Rookie Sam runs out of air underground. S3, Ep4

programme.desc: Summer Sausage, a Pocket Poncho, and Tony Danza: Sheldon is busy obsessing over the status of Meemaw's budding relationship with his mentor, Dr John Sturgis.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Vanilla Ice Cream, Gentlemen Callers, and a Dinette Set: When Meemaw is pursued by two gentlemen callers and decides to date them both, Sheldon interferes.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Day Alex Left for College: Phil and Claire feel snubbed when Alex gives them the wrong college move-in date to avoid them making it a big deal.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: I Lost on Jeopardy!: Erica applies to be on TV quiz show Jeopardy! A new crush makes Barry realise that he might not be quite over Lainey yet.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Mercedes is overcome with emotion as her family hold a vigil for Bobby. Dillon extends an olive branch to an unexpected resident. And will a drunken confession reveal Bobby's real killer?

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: As the McQueens prepare for Bobby's funeral, Mercedes confronts the person who she believes killed her son... Meanwhile, Prince gets some upsetting news. And will a secret fling be exposed?

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: A short, cheeky clip featuring animals and food, from the always hilarious Tube that is Rude.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Lela's: In California, Gordon Ramsay visits Lela's, a fine dining restaurant run by inexperienced owner Lela and young chef Ricky. Can Gordon save them from complete disaster?

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Undercover: Peralta enlists Boyle's help to track down a missing mobster, Holt tests the squad's patience with practice drills, and Gina pleads with Boyle to keep a secret.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Chocolate Milk: Holt's long-time nemesis arrives to carry out an inspection of his precinct. Boyle searches for a plus-one to take to his ex-wife's engagement party.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Simpsorama: In a crossover episode, the Simpsons meet the Planet Express crew from Futurama, who've travelled through time to present-day Springfield to stop a catastrophe.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Blazed and Confused: Bart tricks his family into going to a strange desert festival known as Blazing Guy so that he can get revenge on his sadistic new teacher, Mr Lassen.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A High-Pitched Buzz and Training Wheels: Sheldon dismantles the fridge to stop it making an annoying humming noise but must pay for the damage he's done.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Rival Prodigy and Sir Isaac Neutron: When Sheldon's mentor Dr John Sturgis bonds with Paige, another 10-year-old genius, Sheldon is overcome with jealousy.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: A Moving Day: Claire and Phil aren't convinced that Haley and Dylan can make it on their own when they move them into their new apartment before the baby arrives.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Blasts from the Past: Phil and Claire decide to take a cycling tour through Italy before becoming grandparents, and Dylan introduces them to his mum, who has an interesting past.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Cushion Saturation: A game of paintball leads to a squabble when Penny accidentally shoots paint at one of Sheldon's cushions. Romance blossoms between Howard and Leslie.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Terminator Decoupling: Leonard, Sheldon, Howard and Raj discover that beautiful sci-fi actress Summer Glau is on board their train to San Francisco.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Work Song Nanocluster: Penny's home-based business selling hair accessories gets out of hand when an overexcited Sheldon takes charge of production.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Dead Hooker Juxtaposition: Penny develops a rivalry with a sexy female neighbour who moves into the apartment building and threatens to become the 'new Penny'.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Stakeout: Peralta and Boyle go on an eight-day stakeout, putting a strain on their friendship. Holt's nephew visits and makes an instant impression on Diaz.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Beach House: The team are excited about visiting Boyle's beach house for a detectives-only weekend getaway, until Peralta ruins the fun by inviting Captain Holt.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Kids Are All Fight: When Homer finds an old roll of film and has it developed, the family take a trip down memory lane to when Bart and Lisa were always fighting.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Let's Go Fly a Coot: Bart develops a crush on Milhouse's Dutch cousin. And the family learn about Grampa's days in the Air Force.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Einstein Approximation: Sheldon is baffled by a formula he's working on, so he gets a less mentally taxing job at the Cheesecake Factory to kick-start his creativity.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Large Hadron Collision: Sheldon is gutted when Leonard asks Penny to go to Switzerland on Valentine's Day to see the world's largest particle accelerator instead of him.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Excelsior Acquisition: Sheldon is summoned to court for driving through a red light. He misses the chance to meet Stan Lee and riles the judge. Will he go to prison?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Precious Fragmentation: The gang squabble over a ring that they believe was used in The Lord of the Rings movies, and Sheldon seems to be turning into Gollum.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Do Pizza Bots Dream of Electric Guitars: Homer tries to reunite a mechanical band from his youth, but film and TV creator JJ Abrams gets hold of them first.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Manger Things: A secret from Flanders' past is revealed, and we discover a room in the Simpsons' home that we've never seen before.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Mercedes says an emotional goodbye to Bobby. Meanwhile, one smug resident watches a heated confrontation unfold. And Prince is in an awkward situation when two villagers ask him out.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Old Man and the Lisa: Mr Burns loses all his money and employs Lisa to help him earn back his fortune. But they don't see eye to eye over ethical issues.

programme.title: First Dates

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Cruciferous Vegetable Amplification: Sheldon realises that he won't live long enough to download his consciousness into a robot body, so he tries to extend his lifespan.

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.desc: The Jimmy Jab Games: When the squad have time to kill, Peralta launches the seventh annual Jimmy Jab Games, an eccentric series of contests held in the precinct building.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Halloween II: Peralta and Holt repeat their Halloween wager, as Peralta bets the Captain that he can steal his watch before midnight.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Covercraft: Homer forms a band with four other dads, but their modest early success is soon overwhelmed by the breakout potential of lead singer Apu.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: I Won't Be Home for Christmas: When Moe convinces Homer to stay out late on Christmas Eve, Marge kicks him out of the house and he has to spend Christmas alone.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Crisis of Faith and Octopus Aliens: When Mary's usually robust religious faith is shaken by a tragedy in the community, Sheldon becomes an unlikely ally.

programme.desc: Whanex?: While preparing a presentation for his students about future goals, Cam must contend with a bully at the school. Jay has technical trouble during a video conference.

programme.desc: We Need to Talk About Lily: Phil thinks he's found Pepper's dream home. Mitch and Cam get invited to an exclusive event.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Hofstadter Isotope: Leonard is devastated when Stuart from the comic book shop chats up Penny. Even worse, she doesn't mind. Sheldon tries to scupper the budding romance.

programme.desc: The Classified Materials Turbulence: Things look up for Leonard when Penny makes a surprising revelation on her second date with Stuart. Howard sees a flaw in his NASA project.

programme.title: Hollyoaks

programme.title: News
programme.desc: The leading news stories of the moment.

programme.title: Brassed Off
programme.desc: (1996) Comedy-drama with Pete Postlethwaite, Ewan McGregor and Tara Fitzgerald. When a Yorkshire mining pit closes down, its band tries to win a music contest to restore community pride.

programme.title: I'm Your Man
programme.desc: (2021) Poignant sci-fi romantic comedy with Maren Eggert and Dan Stevens. In near-future Berlin, a lonely archaeologist helps to trial a new line in robot companions. In German/subs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: LumoTV: Up For It?
programme.desc: George Wilkins meets go-kart enthusiast Xavier. Nadia Nadarajah gives Naomi an acting class. Nadeem and Mia perform, Danny skits, Ricco's visual vernacular and Magic's tricks.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: (2015) Animated family comedy sequel. Mavis (Selena Gomez) and Johnny (Andy Samberg) leave baby Dennis with 'Vampa' Dracula (Adam Sandler), who organises a monster boot camp.

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: (1994) Comedy starring Joe Mantegna, Joe Pantoliano and Brian Haley. Inept criminals kidnap a millionaire's baby. But when the boy escapes, there's mayhem as they try to track him down.

programme.title: Father Goose
programme.desc: (1964) WWII romcom. A beach bum (Cary Grant), who spies on Japan's Pacific naval movements for the US, has his life thrown into chaos by a shipwrecked teacher (Leslie Caron) and her pupils.

programme.title: One Million Years B.C.
programme.desc: (1966) Raquel Welch - in her famous fur bikini - stars in this prehistoric adventure set in an inhospitable landscape populated by two warring tribes and Ray Harryhausen's roving dinosaurs.

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: (2004) Sci-fi thriller with Will Smith. In 2035, a technophobic cop investigates a crime that may have been perpetrated by a robot. Can he keep an open mind?

programme.title: Wrath of Man
programme.desc: (2021) Jason Statham reunites with director Guy Ritchie to give it both barrels as a mysterious hardman working for a money truck firm that keeps getting hit. But is he an inside man?

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: (2007) Western starring Christian Bale and Russell Crowe. An impoverished rancher tries to earn some money and his family's respect by escorting a dangerous outlaw on his way to jail.

programme.title: Antlers
programme.desc: (2021) Dark, brooding horror with Keri Russell. A teacher tries to help a troubled pupil. She's in for a shock. The boy's bringing home roadkill for something that's locked in his basement.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3
programme.desc: (2018) Spooky animated family comedy. On a monster-friendly cruise, Dracula (Adam Sandler) falls in love - with a vampire slayer!

programme.title: Ferdinand
programme.desc: (2017) Charming animated bovine road movie from the makers of Ice Age. A huge but gentle bull (voiced by John Cena) tries to get home after being sent away to a bull fighting ranch.

programme.title: Sword of Sherwood Forest
programme.desc: (1960) Adventure with Richard Greene, Peter Cushing and a young Oliver Reed. Can Robin Hood foil the villainous Sheriff of Nottingham's evil plan to murder the Archbishop of Canterbury?

programme.title: Operation Petticoat
programme.desc: (1959) Second World War comedy. Tony Curtis and Cary Grant play members of the crew of a submarine that's painted bright pink just as the Japanese launch their assault in the Pacific.

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: (1997) Romcom with Julia Roberts and Cameron Diaz. Is it okay for a girl to wreck a wedding because she only realises she loves a guy when he tells her he's getting married to someone else?

programme.title: American Gangster Special
programme.desc: Denzel Washington, Russell Crowe and director Ridley Scott talk about making American Gangster, the 2007 crime epic based on an unlikely true story.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: (2007) True crime thriller directed by Ridley Scott. An outcast New York cop (Russell Crowe) is charged with bringing down entrepreneurial Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas (Denzel Washington).

programme.title: Pixie
programme.desc: (2020) Dark comedy with Olivia Cooke, Alec Baldwin and Colm Meaney. A young woman devises a series of elaborate heists and schemes to fund a new life.

programme.title: Bitch Ass
programme.desc: (2022) Slasher horror. It's 1999 LA, and a bunch of kids get sent to rip off a house in their hood. Unfortunately, it belongs to a masked serial killer who likes to play games... literally.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Miracle on 34th Street
programme.desc: (1994) Festive family drama. Richard Attenborough stars as a department store Santa who insists he's the real Santa Claus. But can he prove it in court?

programme.title: The Personal History of David...
programme.desc: ...Copperfield Interview Special: Director Armando Iannucci and actor Dev Patel, who stars in the title role, talk about bringing Charles Dickens' beloved novel to the screen.

programme.title: The Kid Who Would Be King
programme.desc: (2019) Fantasy adventure. A 12-year-old from modern-day suburbia finds King Arthur's sword Excalibur and must save the country from a sinister sorceress. With Patrick Stewart.

programme.title: The Electrical Life of Louis...
programme.desc: ...Wain Interview Special: Stars Benedict Cumberbatch and Claire Foy talk about making director Will Sharpe's eccentric biopic of artist and inventor Louis Wain.

programme.title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
programme.desc: (1970) Oscar-winning drama portraying the bombing of Pearl Harbor, from both American and Japanese perspectives. With Joseph Cotten and So Yamamura.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: (2019) Action comedy with Kristen Stewart, Naomi Scott and Ella Balinska. When an engineer blows the whistle on a deadly device, the Angels put their lives on the line to save the planet.

programme.title: Uncharted
programme.desc: (2022) Going-for-gold action. Tom Holland and Mark Wahlberg compare abs as they scour the globe for an olde explorer's lost gold. The heat is on. The time is right. Only the best survive.

programme.title: Jackass Forever
programme.desc: (2022) Outrageous adult comedy with Johnny Knoxville. The Jackasses reunite to test if older really is wiser by inflicting more playfully real pain on each other - just for fun of course.
(2023) Sci-fi action adventure starring Adam Driver as a spaceman who crash-lands on a strange planet where giant lizards stalk the darkness... 65 million years ago. Where on Earth is he?

programme.desc: (1996) Comedy-drama with Pete Postlethwaite, Ewan McGregor and Tara Fitzgerald. When a Yorkshire mining pit closes down, its band tries to win a music contest to restore community pride.

programme.desc: (2021) Dark, brooding horror with Keri Russell. A teacher tries to help a troubled pupil. She's in for a shock. The boy's bringing home roadkill for something that's locked in his basement.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3
programme.desc: (2018) Spooky animated family comedy. On a monster-friendly cruise, Dracula (Adam Sandler) falls in love - with a vampire slayer!

programme.title: Ferdinand
programme.desc: (2017) Charming animated bovine road movie from the makers of Ice Age. A huge but gentle bull (voiced by John Cena) tries to get home after being sent away to a bull fighting ranch.

programme.title: Sword of Sherwood Forest
programme.desc: (1960) Adventure with Richard Greene, Peter Cushing and a young Oliver Reed. Can Robin Hood foil the villainous Sheriff of Nottingham's evil plan to murder the Archbishop of Canterbury?

programme.title: Operation Petticoat
programme.desc: (1959) Second World War comedy. Tony Curtis and Cary Grant play members of the crew of a submarine that's painted bright pink just as the Japanese launch their assault in the Pacific.

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: (1997) Romcom with Julia Roberts and Cameron Diaz. Is it okay for a girl to wreck a wedding because she only realises she loves a guy when he tells her he's getting married to someone else?

programme.title: American Gangster Special
programme.desc: Denzel Washington, Russell Crowe and director Ridley Scott talk about making American Gangster, the 2007 crime epic based on an unlikely true story.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: (2007) True crime thriller directed by Ridley Scott. An outcast New York cop (Russell Crowe) is charged with bringing down entrepreneurial Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas (Denzel Washington).

programme.title: Pixie
programme.desc: (2020) Dark comedy with Olivia Cooke, Alec Baldwin and Colm Meaney. A young woman devises a series of elaborate heists and schemes to fund a new life.

programme.title: Bitch Ass
programme.desc: (2022) Slasher horror. It's 1999 LA, and a bunch of kids get sent to rip off a house in their hood. Unfortunately, it belongs to a masked serial killer who likes to play games... literally.

programme.title: Teleshopping

programme.title: Miracle on 34th Street
programme.desc: (1994) Festive family drama. Richard Attenborough stars as a department store Santa who insists he's the real Santa Claus. But can he prove it in court?

programme.title: The Personal History of David...
programme.desc: ...Copperfield Interview Special: Director Armando Iannucci and actor Dev Patel, who stars in the title role, talk about bringing Charles Dickens' beloved novel to the screen.

programme.title: The Kid Who Would Be King
programme.desc: (2019) Fantasy adventure. A 12-year-old from modern-day suburbia finds King Arthur's sword Excalibur and must save the country from a sinister sorceress. With Patrick Stewart.

programme.title: The Electrical Life of Louis...
programme.desc: ...Wain Interview Special: Stars Benedict Cumberbatch and Claire Foy talk about making director Will Sharpe's eccentric biopic of artist and inventor Louis Wain.

programme.title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
programme.desc: (1970) Oscar-winning drama portraying the bombing of Pearl Harbor, from both American and Japanese perspectives. With Joseph Cotten and So Yamamura.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: (2019) Action comedy with Kristen Stewart, Naomi Scott and Ella Balinska. When an engineer blows the whistle on a deadly device, the Angels put their lives on the line to save the planet.

programme.title: Uncharted
programme.desc: (2022) Going-for-gold action. Tom Holland and Mark Wahlberg compare abs as they scour the globe for an olde explorer's lost gold. The heat is on. The time is right. Only the best survive.

programme.desc: Father and son Thomas and Neil, Welsh couple Michalina and Phil, and sisters Titi and Tolu from London work out words that appear in the Lingo grids and Puzzlewords. The last remaining duo have the opportunity to win the money they've banked earlier in the show to potentially double their winnings, or leave with nothing. Adil Ray hosts

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a 10,000 jackpot

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as Paul from Norfolk, Roisin from Gateshead, Zoe from Buckinghamshire and Albert from Manchester pit their wits against one of the ruthless Chasers in the hope of winning a potential prize pot worth thousands of pounds. They work as a team and play strategically to answer general knowledge questions against the clock and race down the game board to the exit without being caught

programme.desc: Including regional weather forecast

programme.title: ITV Evening News

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Robert comforts Aaron in his depths of despair and the pair give in to temptation, while Dylan puts on a brave face to April after another knock back in his job search. Cain is left worried when DC Cole wants to talk about the investigation into Nate's murder

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Kit inadvertently jeopardises Sarah's important client meeting, Tyrone catches Steve and Cassie frolicking, Carl finds Tracy waiting in his hotel room, Debbie admonishes Ronnie for interfering in her work, and Dee-Dee worries about a conflict of interest

programme.title: Matthew Perry: A Hollywood Tragedy
programme.desc: Friends star Perry's sudden death in October 2023 shocked the world. A known addict, he was found to have ketamine in his system and months later five individuals were charged with illegally supplying him the drug. This documentary explores Perry's rise to fame and his tragic final days with insights from castmates, friends, law enforcement and Perry's own candid accounts

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: Scotland Tonight
programme.desc: Current affairs programme delving into stories beyond the headlines. Featuring live studio debates and comprehensive analysis, it sheds light on key stories impacting the nation and its surroundings

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell present the stories of two men hoping to find birth family. Joe McGregor was adopted as a baby in Bermuda in the 1970s and grew up in Norfolk in a loving family, yet he still yearns to find his birth family. Simon Miller's mum's dying wish was that he should find the daughter who she gave up for adoption just a few years before he was born

programme.title: Cooking with the Stars
programme.desc: Emma Willis and Tom Allen present the celebrity cookery contest in which famous faces are mentored by world-class chefs to compete in culinary battles. In the first edition, actress Natalie Cassidy goes head to head with radio presenter Jordan North, and reality stars Jack Osbourne and Jessica Wright go up against each other, attempting to deliver gourmet dishes on a budget of just three pounds per portion. Who will go straight through and which two stars will face each other in the cook-off? Others taking part throughout the series are Hugh Dennis, Ekin-Su Clcloglu, Kelly Hoppen and Shaun Wright-Phillips

programme.title: Jimmy's Taste of Florida
programme.desc: Jimmy Doherty embarks on a culinary tour of the Sunshine State, starting in Pensacola, where he explores the city's food scene with chef Blake and uncovers the Southern delicacy of boiled peanuts. Continuing to Panama City Beach, Jimmy meets champion oyster shucker Honor Allen and finds himself in an unwinnable contest, before moving on to a family-run shop to try his hand at doughnut making

programme.title: James Martin's Great British Adventure
programme.desc: James crosses over the Irish Sea to Northern Ireland, where he is joined by famous local chef Paul Rankin. programme.title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Sci-fi action adventure starring James Franco and Freida Pinto. When scientist Will Rodman's programme of drug experiments to find a cure for Alzheimer's disease is shut down he secretly takes an offspring from one of the chimpanzees he was using into his home and names him Caesar. Caesar has inherited the effects of the trial drug and begins to show remarkable intelligence, a development that will put him on a violent collision course with the humans who have abused him.

A known addict, he was found to have ketamine in his system and months later five individuals were charged with illegally supplying him the drug. This documentary explores Perry's rise to fame and his tragic final days with insights from castmates, friends, law enforcement and Perry's own candid accounts

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: Scotland Tonight
programme.desc: Current affairs programme delving into stories beyond the headlines. Featuring live studio debates and comprehensive analysis, it sheds light on key stories impacting the nation and its surroundings

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell present the stories of two men hoping to find birth family. Joe McGregor was adopted as a baby in Bermuda in the 1970s and grew up in Norfolk in a loving family, yet he still yearns to find his birth family. Simon Miller's mum's dying wish was that he should find the daughter who she gave up for adoption just a few years before he was born

programme.title: Cooking with the Stars
programme.desc: Emma Willis and Tom Allen present the celebrity cookery contest in which famous faces are mentored by world-class chefs to compete in culinary battles. In the first edition, actress Natalie Cassidy goes head to head with radio presenter Jordan North, and reality stars Jack Osbourne and Jessica Wright go up against each other, attempting to deliver gourmet dishes on a budget of just three pounds per portion. Who will go straight through and which two stars will face each other in the cook-off? Others taking part throughout the series are Hugh Dennis, Ekin-Su Clcloglu, Kelly Hoppen and Shaun Wright-Phillips

programme.title: Unwind with STV
programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.title: Jimmy's Taste of Florida
programme.desc: Jimmy Doherty embarks on a culinary tour of the Sunshine State, starting in Pensacola, where he explores the city's food scene with chef Blake and uncovers the Southern delicacy of boiled peanuts. Continuing to Panama City Beach, Jimmy meets champion oyster shucker Honor Allen and finds himself in an unwinnable contest, before moving on to a family-run shop to try his hand at doughnut making

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a 10,000 jackpot

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as Judith from Glasgow, Sam from London, Lee from Lincoln and Pam from Liverpool pit their wits against one of the ruthless Chasers in the hope of winning a potential prize pot worth thousands of pounds. programme.title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Sci-fi action adventure starring James Franco and Freida Pinto. When scientist Will Rodman's programme of drug experiments to find a cure for Alzheimer's disease is shut down he secretly takes an offspring from one of the chimpanzees he was using into his home and names him Caesar. Caesar has inherited the effects of the trial drug and begins to show remarkable intelligence, a development that will put him on a violent collision course with the humans who have abused him.
